class KnowledgeBaseAccessor[source]

KnowledgeBaseAccessor()

Class to access the Wikidata Knowledge Base

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
kba = KnowledgeBaseAccessor()
s = kba.query('a > b')
assert s == 'Performing query a > b'
